articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: West African bloc scraps crisis meeting on Niger coup - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: As ECOWAS leaders fail to meet, concerns over the deteriorating health of deposed President Bazoum mount.
articles.content:
An emergency meeting between Wester African nations on the coup in Niger has been postponed indefinitely as concerns over the health of detained President Mohammed Bazoum increase.
